lever.additional:
Gojek is an equal opportunity workplace that is committed to diversity and inclusion. At Gojek we celebrate our differences, because we believe that diversity not only creates a healthier work environment for our employees, but also helps our business thrive. 



About us

Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
lever.description:
About the Team:

The Supply Management team (under MarketPlace) is responsible for ensuring that Gojek’s millions of customers can be paired with the right drivers for the fulfillment of their orders across use cases like transportation, food delivery, shopping, and many more. In our pursuit to continuously optimize supply availability, we also ensure that it is cost-effective for the platform and provide a reliable experience to customers. Our team works very closely with engineering, design, user research, data science, analytics, finance, operations, and security, among others, to build next-generation products. While it might be a challenge to understand everything at once, it’s also an opportunity to grow your learning curve!

About the role:

We are seeking a strategic and data-driven Product Manager to own 1-3 product streams with minimal support and lead a small team of junior PMs (eventually) within the owned product streams ensuring predictability, quality & throughput of their streams and direct reports delivery. To succeed in this role, you must be a thought leader, a driver, and help shape the overall direction as well as key deliverables. You would ensure that product decisions are based on strong logical rigor and in-depth analysis and value data over opinions. You need to be a great storyteller, able to build a strong product narrative that clearly articulates the motivation for the project, goals, and path to success.

As Product Manager, you will be the voice of our customers and define product vision and the plan to achieve it by leveraging technology. We require you to display strong individual ownership and presence, ability to work effectively with multiple remote teams, and have a proven track record of building high impact products.
lever.descriptionPlain:
About the Team:

The Supply Management team (under MarketPlace) is responsible for ensuring that Gojek’s millions of customers can be paired with the right drivers for the fulfillment of their orders across use cases like transportation, food delivery, shopping, and many more. In our pursuit to continuously optimize supply availability, we also ensure that it is cost-effective for the platform and provide a reliable experience to customers. Our team works very closely with engineering, design, user research, data science, analytics, finance, operations, and security, among others, to build next-generation products. While it might be a challenge to understand everything at once, it’s also an opportunity to grow your learning curve!

About the role:

We are seeking a strategic and data-driven Product Manager to own 1-3 product streams with minimal support and lead a small team of junior PMs (eventually) within the owned product streams ensuring predictability, quality & throughput of their streams and direct reports delivery. To succeed in this role, you must be a thought leader, a driver, and help shape the overall direction as well as key deliverables. You would ensure that product decisions are based on strong logical rigor and in-depth analysis and value data over opinions. You need to be a great storyteller, able to build a strong product narrative that clearly articulates the motivation for the project, goals, and path to success.

As Product Manager, you will be the voice of our customers and define product vision and the plan to achieve it by leveraging technology. We require you to display strong individual ownership and presence, ability to work effectively with multiple remote teams, and have a proven track record of building high impact products.

lists.content:
• Drive product strategy, prioritize the long term roadmap and execute on the product initiatives enabling high-quality supply management for Gojek’s 20+ service offerings
  • Build an intelligent platform that provides recommendations for and allows business teams to dynamically optimize supply availability in an extremely cost-effective and reliable manner
  • Lead a cross-functional team, partnering with engineering, data science and other product teams to ship high impact capabilities and product improvements driving efficiency
  • Define, track and report on key product, business and customer metrics
  • Seek product ideas and feedback, gather requirements, write specs, create wireframes and workflows
  • Partner with the design and user research teams to understand customer problems and identify and iterate on solutions
  • Define clear and well-scoped requirements documents that are easily understood by technical and non-technical audiences
  • Work with our business intelligence and analytics team to understand customer behavior and identify problems and opportunities
  • Collaborate with internal stakeholders in support, marketing, operations, and business to develop go to market strategy, product messaging and training for a successful launch
  • Advocates for resourcing and staffing needs within their stream. Acts as a hiring manager for direct reports and participates in the hiring process by interviewing candidates, submitting referrals, attending recruiting events and/or presenting externally

• A Bachelor’s / Masters or an equivalent degree, preferably in engineering or management
  • At least 4 years of experience working as a product manager, ideally working on consumer-facing, large-scale products. Additional experience as a product analyst or data scientist or software engineer is a plus.
  • Past experience in a similar domain as Gojek
  • Independent and curious, you set your own targets, ask for help when you need it and are always looking to learn something new
  • Analytical and data-driven, you love digging into the data to understand what’s happening and define & measure success on every project. Fluency with numbers is a must.
  • You are comfortable to give a very high view of the roadmap and also simultaneously you are comfortable with talking about the details of finer nuances in product 
  • You are comfortable in working with research teams to define the problem statements and getting in the depth of problem areas 
  • You’re passionate about your customers and always bring questions back to what will serve them best
  • You have experience leading agile product development teams and are always looking for ways to help them be more effective
